snippet.title: Love Esquire - Hype Trailer [v2]
snippet.description:
Love Esquire is a romantic-comedy visual novel/dating sim with a touch of old-school RPG combat. In this game, you're not a famous knight, but a good-for-nothing squire who's on a quest to find man's greatest pleasure. Getting the girl won't be easy though, since most of them are waaaay out of your league!

So raise those stats, battle monsters, and unleash your full potential!

---

Save the date!! Love Esquire is releasing this October 8 at 10:00 am PDT! Wishlist the game now!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/849740
Steam Developer: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/yangyangmobile
Itch.io: https://yangyangmobile.itch.io/love-esquire
Patreon: http://patreon.com/yangyangmobile
Discord: http://discordapp.com/invite/dACNN8P
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/yangyangmobile/
Twitter: http://twitter.com/yangyangmobile
